description: Metric suggestions organized by outcome type with measurement guidance

growth.description: Metrics for business expansion, market growth, and scale objectives

metrics.name: Revenue Growth Rate
metrics.description: Percentage increase in revenue over a specific time period

measurement.method: Calculate percentage change in revenue between periods
measurement.calculation: ((Current Period Revenue - Previous Period Revenue) / Previous Period Revenue) × 100
measurement.baseline_guidance: Use same period from previous year or rolling 12-month average
measurement.target_setting: Industry benchmarks: SaaS 20-40% YoY, E-commerce 15-30% YoY

good_usage: Increase monthly recurring revenue from $500K to $750K (50% growth)
Grow total revenue from $2M to $3.2M annually (60% growth)
Achieve quarterly revenue growth of 25% vs previous year
poor_usage: Grow revenue better than last quarter
implementation_notes: Track monthly for faster feedback cycles
Segment by product line or customer type for actionable insights

metrics.name: Customer Acquisition Rate
metrics.description: Number of new customers gained per time period

measurement.method: Count new customers who complete first purchase or subscription
measurement.calculation: Sum of new customers in specified time period
measurement.baseline_guidance: Calculate average from previous 6 months, account for seasonality
measurement.target_setting: Set based on sales capacity, marketing budget, and conversion rates

good_usage: Acquire 200 new enterprise customers per month
Grow customer base from 5K to 8K customers
Add 50 new paid subscribers weekly

metrics.name: Market Share Growth
metrics.description: Percentage of total available market captured

measurement.method: Calculate company revenue as percentage of total market size
measurement.baseline_guidance: Use industry research reports for market size estimates
measurement.target_setting: Research competitive landscape and set realistic capture targets

good_usage: Capture 15% market share in enterprise security (from current 8%)
Become #2 player with 25% share in local food delivery
Achieve 12% share of addressable cloud storage market
implementation_notes: Consider market expansion vs share capture

efficiency.description: Metrics for operational improvement, cost reduction, and productivity enhancement

metrics.name: Cost Per Unit
metrics.description: Total cost to produce or deliver one unit of product/service

measurement.method: Divide total costs by number of units produced/delivered
measurement.calculation: Total Costs (Direct + Indirect) / Total Units Produced
measurement.baseline_guidance: Calculate average over 3-6 months to account for variability
measurement.target_setting: Benchmark against industry standards and historical performance

good_usage: Reduce cost per order fulfillment from $8.50 to $6.25
Decrease customer acquisition cost from $150 to $95
Lower cost per software deployment from $500 to $200
implementation_notes: Track quality metrics alongside cost reduction
Monitor for unintended consequences on quality

metrics.name: Process Automation Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of process steps completed without manual intervention

measurement.method: Calculate ratio of automated to total process steps
measurement.baseline_guidance: Audit current processes to establish baseline automation level
measurement.target_setting: Identify high-impact processes for automation priority

good_usage: Automate 80% of customer onboarding process (from current 35%)
Achieve 90% automated testing coverage for software deployments
Automate 70% of invoice processing workflow
implementation_notes: Focus on high-volume, repetitive processes first
Measure time savings and error reduction

quality.description: Metrics for product/service quality, customer satisfaction, and reliability

metrics.name: Defect Rate
metrics.description: Percentage of products/services that fail to meet quality standards

measurement.method: Calculate ratio of defective units to total units produced
measurement.baseline_guidance: Establish clear definition of defects and track consistently
measurement.target_setting: Set based on industry standards and customer expectations

good_usage: Reduce software bug escape rate from 3.2% to <1%
Achieve <0.5% defect rate in manufacturing (from current 2.1%)
Lower customer-reported issue rate from 5% to 2%
implementation_notes: Track both internal and customer-discovered defects
Implement preventive measures, not just detection

metrics.name: Net Promoter Score (NPS)
metrics.description: Measure of customer loyalty and satisfaction based on likelihood to recommend

measurement.method: Survey customers with 0-10 likelihood to recommend question
measurement.baseline_guidance: Survey representative sample monthly or quarterly

good_usage: Increase NPS from 32 to 55
Achieve NPS >50 for enterprise customers
Maintain NPS >60 while scaling to 10K customers
implementation_notes: Segment by customer type and product

innovation.description: Metrics for new product development, R&D effectiveness, and market innovation

metrics.name: Innovation Pipeline Health
metrics.description: Number and quality of new ideas progressing through development stages

measurement.method: Track projects by development stage with success probability weighting
measurement.calculation: Sum of (Projects × Stage Success Probability) by stage
measurement.baseline_guidance: Establish stages and historical success rates for each stage
measurement.target_setting: Set targets for each stage based on resource capacity and goals

good_usage: Maintain 20 projects in early stage, 8 in development, 3 in pilot
Achieve 60% success rate from concept to launch
Generate $2M revenue pipeline from innovation projects
implementation_notes: Define clear stage gates and criteria
Track both quantity and quality of pipeline

metrics.name: Time to Market
metrics.description: Duration from concept to product launch or feature release

measurement.method: Track time from defined start point to market availability
measurement.calculation: Average days from concept approval to market launch
measurement.baseline_guidance: Establish clear start and end point definitions
measurement.target_setting: Benchmark against industry standards and competitive needs

good_usage: Reduce time to market from 18 months to 12 months for major features
Launch new products within 6 months of concept approval
Achieve 90-day sprint-to-market capability for competitive responses
implementation_notes: Track both planned and actual timeframes
